name: Glitter Art 3D
description:
Let your artwork shine in Glitter Art 3D! 

In this fun and addictive game you will use the tools provided to you to make sparkling pieces of art. Cover your page in glue then sprinkle the glitter over the page. When you're finished shake it off to reveal your masterpiece.

There's so many different creations to unlock as you progress through the game so why not challenge yourself to see how many you can complete!

Glitter Art 3D features:
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Colorful graphics
- New artwork to unlock
